closed note 99460 (near 9727, Western Transdanubia, 9727, Hungary) / * 2014 January 11 10:13 Created: Moved from OSB ID606293: / There are some caves NW Bozsog: Kalapos-köi-barlang, Holler-barlang, Tüzifas-barlang, Lena-fülke, Ladera-fülke, Arktik-fülke, Hegedüs-fülke, Antarktik-fülke, Limax-barlang, Csalanos-eresz, and Nyiladek-melletti-barlang. Can you find out actual positions and correct spelling? [fkv, 2011-08-16 22:14:18 CEST] / Some of the spellings: Kalapos-kői-barlang, Tűzifás-barlang (or Tüzifás, I'm unsure here, looks like both spelling is used), Hegedűs-fülke, Csalános-eresz, Nyiladék-melletti-barlang. The others were correct. No idea about their positions though. However, it's possible to find information such as: http://turistautak.hu/poi.php?id=16290 [NaTToMi, 2011-08-20 21:20:48 CEST] / There are also plenty of cave names and coordinates on http://geogr.elte.hu/nonkarstic/ . It would be great to import caves from either site. Has anybody asked for permission yet? [fkv, 2011-09-09 17:15:26 CEST] / turistautak is unlikely to give permission, but the ELTE guys might. I could not find any contact information on their site. Anybody else tried? [sz, 2012-10-04 12:11:08 CEST] / Contacted the "nonkarstic" team, still waiting for reply. [sz, 2012-10-11 11:45:31 CEST] / no answer yet? maybe the mail got lost? [fkv, 2013-02-05 23:15:13 CET] / They have not answered, but according to their page, the data can be digitally copied and distributed, so I think they would not be too cross if we imported it to OSM with proper attribution, but I am not a lawyer. [szszszsz, 2013-03-29 11:33:38 CET] / * 2014 July 6 10:47 nemethtamas Updated: A http://geogr.elte.hu/nonkarstic/ oldal koordinátái sajnos nem túl pontosak, helyenként több száz méteres eltérések vannak. / * 2014 October 1 21:42 fkv Updated: Inaccurate data is better than having no data at all. As soon as the caves are inside OSM, mappers (including me) will be going to improve data quality. I am still concerned about the lack of permission, though. Can anybode cite the statement on their website supposedly permitting digital redistribution? / * 2020 August 24 07:51 urbalazs Resolved: This is a very old note and it seems, there is no progress on this issue. However, this function is used to report map defects, but many missing objects is reported here. IMHO for reporting many missing map features you should open separate notes for each. Please put new notes to the places where the caves should be, separate note for each. Then it would be easier to fix the issues. I close this note for now. / * 2020 August 24 07:58 fkv Reactivated: / * 2020 August 24 08:10 fkv Updated: Notes should be closed when the missing data has been added, not when there is no progress. However, some of the caves have meanwhile been added. As far as I can see, still missing are: Tüzifás, Lena-fülke, Ladera-fülke, Arktik-fülke, Hegedűs-fülke, Nyiladék-melletti-barlang. If I knew where exactly they are, I would have mapped them myself. You can use the links above to find out where they are supposed to be. I don't know whether they are big enough to be worth mapping, but given that they have names, they probably are. / * 2023 November 7 18:41 PPete2 Resolved: fkv, after 12 years it's quite obvious that an OSM note isn't the right place to ask for recherche to your detailed questions regarding caves. / Please contact Hungarian cave clubs, cave forums or local governments instead, thanks for understanding.

new note 3976771 (near 1192, Central Hungary, 1192, Hungary) / * 2023 November 7 12:15 sfphoton Created: Szerintem ez a zebra (https://www.openstreetmap.org/node/6796311033) már nincs meg. A két közeli sarkon van kijelölt gyalogátkelő, amit a térkép is jelez. / Majd elmegyek megnézni pár nap múlva, ha addig senki nem oldja meg. Ha valaki ezt egy hét múlva is itt látja, legyen szíves válaszban megpingelni.

closed note 3963268 (near 4002, North Great Plain, 4002, Hungary) / * 2023 October 29 13:46 jancsi00 Created: fdfd / Hidden At By Html
/ * 2023 November 1 12:42 woodpeck Reactivated: / * 2023 November 1 12:42 woodpeck Updated: this note was accidentally hidden (sorry) and has now been reopened. / * 2023 November 6 19:47 Mateusz Konieczny - bot account Resolved: Closing note as not containing report of mistakes in OSM data. Note text was "fdfd" / If you wanted to report problems with OSM data please open a more clear note. / See https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Dev_Server_Account for how test notes can be created at a separate server. / Such notes for closure are found automatically, with all closures reviewed by human.
